snippet.title: Death Relives: Unreal Engine 5 Upgrade Announcement
snippet.description:
As Nyctophile Studios, we're currently working on "Death Relives", a stealth/survival horror game with an unique AI design(Aztec God) & gameplay mechanics. 
Different than classic horror games in the market, we've wanted to increase the overall tension during gameplay, and designed a unique villain AI which is planned to pursue the player during whole gameplay. Meanwhile, player is supposed to solve puzzles and stay hidden from AI. Player doesn't have any super-powers or similar characteristics, so we thought this may make the overall gameplay more realistic and tense.

Stay tuned for more information...
